overview:
Mr. Plus Wu is an analyst of the General Partner and assists in investments in the China market. With his engineering background and knowledge in technology commercialization, he keeps a good relationship with technology community and works closely with entrepreneurs to build companies with strong growth potential.

Prior to joining Vickers Venture Partners, Mr. Plus Wu was the co-founder in Maptour Co. Ltd, which provided location-based service to travellers. He also had work experience in Quanr.com, a leading travel search engine in China.

Mr. Plus Wu is fluent in Mandarin, English and Cantonese. He graduated from Tongji University, majoring in Software Engineering.
